name: MaximalSpectrum.mk.inj
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝ : CommSemiring R
asIdeal✝ : Ideal R
isMaximal✝ : asIdeal✝.IsMaximal
asIdeal : Ideal R
isMaximal : asIdeal.IsMaximal
x✝ : Eq { asIdeal := asIdeal✝, isMaximal := isMaximal✝ } { asIdeal := asIdeal, isMaximal := isMaximal }
⊢ Eq asIdeal✝ asIdeal
decl:
/-- The maximal spectrum of a commutative (semi)ring `R` is the type of all
maximal ideals of `R`. -/
@[ext]
structure MaximalSpectrum (R : Type*) [CommSemiring R] where
  asIdeal : Ideal R
  isMaximal : asIdeal.IsMaximal

name: MaximalSpectrum.ext
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝ : CommSemiring R
x y : MaximalSpectrum R
asIdeal : Eq x.asIdeal y.asIdeal
⊢ Eq x y
decl:
/-- The maximal spectrum of a commutative (semi)ring `R` is the type of all
maximal ideals of `R`. -/
@[ext]
structure MaximalSpectrum (R : Type*) [CommSemiring R] where
  asIdeal : Ideal R
  isMaximal : asIdeal.IsMaximal

name: MaximalSpectrum.ext_iff
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝ : CommSemiring R
x y : MaximalSpectrum R
⊢ Iff (Eq x y) (Eq x.asIdeal y.asIdeal)
decl:
/-- The maximal spectrum of a commutative (semi)ring `R` is the type of all
maximal ideals of `R`. -/
@[ext]
structure MaximalSpectrum (R : Type*) [CommSemiring R] where
  asIdeal : Ideal R
  isMaximal : asIdeal.IsMaximal

name: MaximalSpectrum.isMaximal
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝ : CommSemiring R
self : MaximalSpectrum R
⊢ self.asIdeal.IsMaximal
decl:

@[ext]
structure MaximalSpectrum (R : Type*) [CommSemiring R] where

  isMaximal : asIdeal.IsMaximal

name: MaximalSpectrum.mk.injEq
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝ : CommSemiring R
asIdeal✝ : Ideal R
isMaximal✝ : asIdeal✝.IsMaximal
asIdeal : Ideal R
isMaximal : asIdeal.IsMaximal
⊢ Eq (Eq { asIdeal := asIdeal✝, isMaximal := isMaximal✝ } { asIdeal := asIdeal, isMaximal := isMaximal }) (Eq asIdeal✝ asIdeal)
decl:
/-- The maximal spectrum of a commutative (semi)ring `R` is the type of all
maximal ideals of `R`. -/
@[ext]
structure MaximalSpectrum (R : Type*) [CommSemiring R] where
  asIdeal : Ideal R
  isMaximal : asIdeal.IsMaximal

name: MaximalSpectrum.mk.sizeOf_spec
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : SizeOf R
asIdeal : Ideal R
isMaximal : asIdeal.IsMaximal
⊢ Eq (SizeOf.sizeOf { asIdeal := asIdeal, isMaximal := isMaximal }) (HAdd.hAdd (HAdd.hAdd 1 (SizeOf.sizeOf asIdeal)) (SizeOf.sizeOf isMaximal))
decl:
/-- The maximal spectrum of a commutative (semi)ring `R` is the type of all
maximal ideals of `R`. -/
@[ext]
structure MaximalSpectrum (R : Type*) [CommSemiring R] where
  asIdeal : Ideal R
  isMaximal : asIdeal.IsMaximal

initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝ : CommSemiring R
self : MaximalSpectrum R
⊢ self.asIdeal.IsMaximal
